Caption: Invitation to the third convocation
Description: The third convocation invitation card was simple and formal. It was made using firm cartridge paper that was cream coloured. The invitation was printed as a bi-fold-landscape card (cover dimensions: 17.5 cm Ã— 12.6 cm). The information inside the card included details about the programme and chief guest/speaker, specific instructions for attendance and R.S.V.P. details.
